price: 44. Bazangaki kotosa mibeko mia Nkolo wa bango kino etumbu ezuaki bango bazali kornona.
arabic: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: faʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim fa-akhadhathumu al-ṣāʿiqatu wahum yanẓurūna
